name: daniel.is-a.dev
description: My website on GitHub. It is written in nodejs and express. Uses HTML and CSS for the frontend and uses mongodb in the backend for the blogs.

name: Giveaways Discord Bot
description: Giveaway Drops is an advanced discord bot made for hosting giveaways on Discord, you can use many features including setting a custom requirement to enter the giveaway and more!

name: Cosmic
description: Cosmic is a web scraper written in Golang, it was my first public program written in Golang. I made it open source so people can check it out but the code is very bad.

name: Free .is-a.dev domains
description: I don't own this but I am a maintainer for this repo. We allow developers to get a custom name.is-a.dev domain with their name on it.

name: Repl-Talk Analytics
description: My first project as a data engineer?? A tool that allows you to track analytics for your repltalk posts with a simple image badge.

name: Discord SSH Client
description: A discord bot that allows you to connect to SSH servers and run commands all from inside your Discord app!
